UNIQUE ITEMS

There are 471 unique items in Median XL.

Normal Uniques
Most unique items can exist in Tier 1 to Tier 6 versions. Higher tier versions of the same unique have similar stats, but are improved in all areas. See the BASE ITEMS page for details on item tiers.

Sacred Uniques
Additionally, the sacred tier of each item type has its own unique version. Sacred uniques can only drop in level 121 areas and nowhere else.

Unique Amulets, Rings, Quivers and Jewels
These item types have no tiers. Most unique amulets, rings, quivers and jewels can be found in the regular game, though the very best only spawn in level 121 areas.

* The following areas are level 121 on Destruction (Hell) difficulty :

Uberquests
· Dungeon uberquest: Cathedral of Vanity
· Dungeon uberquest: Toraja
· Summoning uberquest: Lord Aldric Jitan
· Summoning uberquest: Legacy of Blood
· Summoning uberquest: Judgement Day
· Summoning uberquest: Inarius' Revenge
· Uberlevel: Kurast 3000 BA
· Uberlevel: Island of the Sunless Sea
· Uberlevel: Khalimgrad
· Uberlevel: Tran Athulua
· Uberlevel: Fauztinville
· Uberlevel: Ghosts of Old Bremmtown
· Uberlevel: Kingdom of Shadow
Heroic areas
· The Cow Level
· Mausoleum
· Stony Tomb Level 1
· Icy Cellar

More information about these areas can be found in the UBERQUESTS MENU.

Additionally, bosses in level 118+ areas are also level 121, though the chance of finding a level 121 unique item this way is fairly small.

Sockets
All unique items come with the maximum allowed number of sockets for the item type.

Oskills
If a unique has a skill bonus with no character class requirement (eg. +3-6 to Summon Shadows), then the bonus is an 'oskill', giving this skill to any class for free.

List of Weapons
